hours_text:
[Home](/) > [Visit](/visit)

# Prepare for a breathtaking history lesson.

The Joel Lane Museum House is located at the corner of South St. Mary’s and West Hargett Streets in Raleigh, North Carolina. Tours begin in the Visitors Center at 160 South Saint Mary’s Street.

Enter a starting address to receive driving directions.

## Admission Information

_**All on-tours of the museum are free of charge.**_

Tours times:

**Wednesday, Thursday, & Friday tours **are at 10am, 11am, 12pm, and 1pm.

**Saturday tours** are at 1pm, 2pm, & 3pm.

Walk-ins welcome! Please call ahead for groups larger than 6 people.

_Please note that we do not offer public tours when pre-scheduled adult groups or school field-trips are on-site. Please call ahead at_[ _919-833-3431_](tel:919-833-3431) _to check availability._  

## Upcoming Dates & Times with No Public Tours

_**JLMH is closed from Dec 22, 2025-Jan 9th, 2026. Tours will resume on Saturday, January 10th, 2026**._

**January 2026**

Friday, Jan 23rd - Private tour at 10am. All other times available.

Wednesday, Jan 28th - Closed. Staff will be off-site for school event. No tour times available.

———————————————————————————

### More Information:

####  Plus (click or tap to expand) + Parking and Directions

The museum is located at the corner of Hargett and St. Mary’s Streets, near Boylan Bridge. Enter “160 South Saint Mary’s Street, Raleigh” into your GPS.  
  
Parking is free. On-street parking is available on Saint Mary’s Street in front o...

collections_text:
## JLMH OPEN FOR TOURS

_**Regular Tour times:**_

On **Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday** tours take place at 10 am, 11 am, 12 pm, and 1 pm.

On**Saturday** tours are at 1 pm, 2 pm, & 3 pm.

All museum tours are free of charge.

———————————————————————————

Walk-ins welcome! Please call ahead for groups larger than 6 people.

All tours are guided. Museum not open for individual walkthrough.  
———————————————————————————

 _Public tours are not offered when school field trip groups or other pre-scheduled groups are on-site. Please call_[ _919-833-3431_](tel:919-833-3431) _to check on tour availability._

_**JLMH is closed from Dec 22, 2025-Jan 9th, 2026. Tours will resume on Saturday, January 10th, 2026**._

**January 2026**

Friday, Jan 23rd - Private tour at 10am. All other times available.

Wednesday, Jan 28th - Closed. Staff will be off-site for school event. No tour times available.

——————————————————————————

### Museum Store

The Visitor’s Center/Gift Shop is open for weekday perusal from Wednesday to Friday. The shop is open from 10 am to 2 pm.

## Help the Joel Lane Museum House

You can help us bring history to life by [donating to JLMH!](https://www.joellane.org/support-join)

[Donate](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=KGEXH8HCLZCB6&source=url)

...Or, volunteer your time and talents!

[Volunteer](/volunteer)
